1.title: From Argentina to Guyana
1.plot: Graham gets his "crack team" of helpers together (his mum and dad), says goodbye to his girlfriend and heads off to Argentina for the start of his epic World Record Breaking journey.

2.title: Caribbean Castaway
2.plot: Graham ploughs head-first into the Caribbean and finds that getting from one island to another without flying is easier said than done.

3.title: From Cuba to Tunisia
3.plot: Graham races from Cuba to Mexico, up through America to Canada, across the Atlantic Ocean on a cargo ship and then visits every country in Europe in record time - all without flying.

4.title: Arrested in Africa
4.plot: With 85 countries down and just 115 more to go, Graham launches head-first into Africa... although the welcoming committee is not quite what he was expecting.

5.title: Africa Rough Road
5.plot: After escaping jail in Cape Verde, Graham now has to escape the island... without flying. He then attempts to race across the 15 nations of West Africa overland, during the wet season.

6.title: Congo Chaos
6.plot: As Graham hits his 108th country of The Odyssey Expedition, disaster strikes once again: he's striped and thrown into a jail cell in Congo by drunken policemen convinced he's a spy.

7.title: Africa Island Hop
7.plot: Crossing the Congo river into the southern half of Africa, Graham faces challenges from Angola, South Africa, Tanzania and attempts to get all the way to Mauritius in the middle of the Indian Ocean - all without flying.

8.title: Pyramids or Bust
8.plot: Graham has to race up East Africa against a ticking clock in order to meet his erstwhile girlfriend before the end of the year at the place they first met - the Pyramids of Giza.

imdb.plot outline: British filmmaker Graham Hughes is taking his love of travelling to the limit, embarking on an epic - challenge to step foot in every country on earth in a single year without flying. This series documents his madcap attempt to break a world record by visiting 200 countries and travelling 90,000 kilometers in 52 weeks of non-stop travelling - virtually all of it on public transport. Racing against a ticking clock, Graham sets out with no support, a limited budget and only a video camera for company. His plan is to not only bag a world record but raise oodles of cash for charity and win the hand of the girl he wants to marry on the finishing line. The trip of a lifetime, a flight of fancy, or a recipe for failure? Only time will tell.
imdb.title: Lonely Planet's The Odyssey
plot: The first official attempt to visit every country in the world in one epic journey, without flying.::Hughes, Graham

British filmmaker Graham Hughes is taking his love of travelling to the limit, embarking on an epic - challenge to step foot in every country on earth in a single year without flying. This series documents his madcap attempt to break a world record by visiting 200 countries and travelling 90,000 kilometers in 52 weeks of non-stop travelling - virtually all of it on public transport. Racing against a ticking clock, Graham sets out with no support, a limited budget and only a video camera for company. His plan is to not only bag a world record but raise oodles of cash for charity and win the hand of the girl he wants to marry on the finishing line. The trip of a lifetime, a flight of fancy, or a recipe for failure? Only time will tell.::Graham Hughes
